title: NERF RAMMUS, IS A STUPID NO SENSE UNBALANCED CHAMP
body: Really, {{champion:33}} need a nerf, he  can go full tank and deal a lot of damage just  running on the enemies taunting them for 3 hours and dont take damage, he can dive at level 4 and dont die, he is too fast, also if a team had a good deep vision Rammus is so fast that can do a gank in 2 sec. At lmid-lategame he can go alone 1 v 5 don take damage and can take at least one or two kills ALONE ! RIOT NERF RAMMUS NOW!

replies.body: There is something called crowd control, that a lof of champions can cast from a distance and stopps Rammus
lol bro i know but he can easly dodge it when he use his q and has mobility boots, anyway when you see him arrive in lane he  is too fast that you have no time for cast...

Really guys, every game  even if my team is winning in every lane he can stop all, as well the summoners in other teams are noobs, just roll with the speed of light  no time for reaction ...taunt for 2 hours( the target can not even flash away when focused!) and gg for him...very annoying and unbalanced.
